about_the_game:
COUNTDOWN FINAL ZONE

offers an electrifying first-person shooting experience, set in sprawling post-apocalyptic landscapes. Arm yourself with a diverse arsenal of lethal weaponry and brace for intense clashes across various game modes.

DIVERSE GAME MODES

Engage in heart-pounding battles against up to 24 players across expansive maps, each mode offering a distinct challenge:

BATTLE ROYALE: Survive at all costs as you compete to be the last one standing.
DEATHMATCH: Pit yourself against every opponent in a fierce free-for-all.
TEAM DEATHMATCH: Coordinate with your squad to dominate the opposition and emerge victorious.

UNLEASH THE FURY

Scour the environment for powerful weapons and strategic advantages, mastering the art of combat in dynamic and adrenaline-fueled gameplay. From explosive grenades to precision firearms, each tool of destruction offers a unique advantage in the fight for survival.

EXPANSIVE MAPS

Explore sprawling post-apocalyptic landscapes, each with its own strategic nuances and tactical opportunities. Adapt to the terrain, outmaneuver your foes, and claim victory in the ultimate showdown.

JOIN THE FRAY

Whether you prefer the intensity of solo combat or the camaraderie of team-based warfare, COUNTDOWN FINAL ZONE delivers thrilling action and endless possibilities. Are you ready to rise to the challenge and stake your claim in the Final Zone?

name: Countdown Final Zone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: 2+ GHZ Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: 4 Core or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: geforce 1050 Ti

short_description: It is first person online shooter with dynamic gameplay on post-apocalyptic landscapes. Choose from an array of lethal weapons and dive into thrilling battle royale, deathmatch, and team deathmatch modes.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
